item.description:
Update: Due to the prediction of light rain and cool temperatures I recommend cancelling the picnic part of the hike. Hike and Geocache still on.


We are going to have a Hike and locate a Geocache (GCJ6C1) during this easy 2 mile hike. (Weather permitting).

Parking is located on Avery Hill Rd. On the East Track. We will be hiking across the street (low traffic rd.) in the Avalonia Land Conservancy - Avery Preserve West Track.

This is a relatively easy hike. There are some muddy parts and some water as well as a few easy hills.

If the weather works for us we should have a picnic at the small pond area. There is a bunch of rocks and a bench and the dogs can enjoy the water. Also there is a Geocache in the area that we can locate.

Geocache: (GCJ6C1)
http://www.geocaching...


Trail Map:
http://www.avaloniala...


Here is the location of the parking lot.
http://maps.google.co...


What is GeoCaching?
http://www.geocaching...
"Geocaching is a worldwide game of hiding and seeking treasure. A geocacher can place a geocache in the world, pinpoint its location using GPS technology and then share the geocacheâ€™s existence and location online. Anyone with a GPS unit can then try to locate the geocache."

http://www.geocaching...
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in the parking lot with a Blue Ford Edge
item.name: Avalonia Land Conservancy - Avery Preserve West Track
